English: lit. river water does not interfere with well water (idiom); Do not interfere with one another.

h.b: ㄏㄜˊ　ㄕㄨㄟˇ　ㄅㄨˋ　ㄈㄢˋ　ㄐㄧㄥˇ　ㄕㄨㄟˇ

d.f: `河~`水~`和~`井水~`各~`不相干~。`比喻~`界限~`分明~，`互~`不干~`犯~。`如~：「`我~`做~`我~`的~，`你~`做~`你~`的~，`咱們~`彼此~`河水不犯井水~！」`也~`作~「`井水不犯河水~」。

h.p: hé shuǐ bù fàn jǐng shuǐ

English: lit. river water does not interfere with well water (idiom); Do not interfere with one another.
